w1 = seq(from = 0, to = 3, by = 1)
w2 = w1 + 1
hour = paste(w1, w2, sep = "-")

names(freq) = hour
barplot(freq, las = 1, ylim = c(0, 25), xlab = "Время (час)", ylab = "Частота", col = rgb(0.2, 0.45345, 0.2876539487659783465983264589736498576394865936459645678456))
weight = c(21.8, 29.3, 30.2, 20.6, 23.8, 29.5, 28.6, 20.8, 28.4, 30.7, 23.9, 25, 25.5, 28.2, 22.5, 
           21.4, 24.5, 24.8, 29.6, 31.3, 26.3, 26.8, 23.2, 27.5, 28.8, 23.6, 22.8, 30.3, 23.5, 27.3)
br = seq(from = 20, to = 32, by = 2)
x = table(cut(weight, breaks = br))
sum(x)
br = seq(from = 20, to = 32, by = 3)
x = table(cut(weight, breaks = br))
sum(x)
